common.homepage: Taiwan Site for Psychedelic Studies of Consciousness

footer.description: Taiwan Site for Psychedelic Studies of Consciousness is a media dedicated to exploring the potential and impact of psychedelic substances in culture, art, and psychotherapy. We hope to increase public awareness and understanding of psychedelic consciousness by sharing knowledge, stories, and creativity, and to promote the development of related research.
